{

                law_bonus bonus 3
                taxable_income_bonus bonus -20
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  7200 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                royal_barracks
            }
        }
        royal_barracks requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, }  and building_present_min_level smith smiths_workshop

            capability

                recruit "War Chariot"  2  requires factions { numidia, } 
                recruit "Light Chariot Archer"  2  requires factions { numidia, } 
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;missiles;;;;;;;;;;
                recruit "Citizen Archer"  2  requires factions { numidia, } 
                recruit "Citizen Crossbowman"  2  requires factions { numidia, } 
                recruit "Heavy Crossbowman"  3  requires factions { numidia, } 
                law_bonus bonus 4
                taxable_income_bonus bonus -30
            }
            construction  7 
            cost  14400 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

building market
{
    levels trader market forum great_forum curia 
    {
        trader requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  900 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                market
            }
        }
        market requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent spy  0  requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { carthaginian, }  and resource furs
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { carthaginian, }  and resource iron
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                forum
            }
        }
        forum requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent spy  0  requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3 requires factions { barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { carthaginian, }  and resource furs
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { carthaginian, }  and resource iron
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  3600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                great_forum
            }
        }
        great_forum requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent spy  0  requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4 requires factions { barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3 requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { carthaginian, }  and resource furs
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { carthaginian, }  and resource iron
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  7200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                curia
            }
        }
        curia requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent spy  0  requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 5 requires factions { barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4 requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { carthaginian, }  and resource furs
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { carthaginian, }  and resource iron
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  7 
            cost  14400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

    levels blacksmith smiths_workshop foundry 
    {
        blacksmith requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, }  and building_present_min_level market trader
        {

                weapon_simple 1
                weapon_bladed 1
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades

                smiths_workshop
            }
        }
        smiths_workshop requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, }  and building_present_min_level market trader
        {
            capability

                weapon_simple 1
                weapon_bladed 1
                weapon_missile 1
                armour 1
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  3600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                foundry
            }
        }
        foundry requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, }  and building_present_min_level market market
        {
            capability
            {
                weapon_simple 2
                weapon_bladed 2
                weapon_missile 2
                armour 2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  8400 
            settlement_min huge_city

building port_buildings
{
    levels port shipwright dockyard 
    {
        port requires factions { carthaginian, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval boats"  0  requires factions { barbarian, hun, } 
                recruit "Zouke wei"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { eastern, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_scipii, romans_brutii, romans_senate, } 
                trade_fleet 1 requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                trade_fleet 1 requires factions { barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, } 
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  2000 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                shipwright
            }
        }
        shipwright requires factions { numidia, armenia, barbarian, roman, eastern, egyptian, greek, carthaginian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval boats"  0  requires factions { barbarian, hun, } 
                recruit "naval large boats"  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "Zouke wei"  1  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                recruit "Mengchong wei"  1  requires factions { numidia, armenia, carthaginian, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { eastern, } 
                recruit "naval triremes"  0  requires factions { eastern, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "naval triremes"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "naval triremes"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_scipii, romans_brutii, romans_senate, } 
                recruit "naval triremes"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_scipii, romans_brutii, romans_senate, } 
                trade_fleet 1 requires factions { spain, dacia, britons, carthaginian, } 
                trade_fleet 2 requires factions { numidia, armenia, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, carthaginian, } 
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 5
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                dockyard
            }
        }
        dockyard requires factions { carthage, egypt, greek, roman, armenia, numidia, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval boats"  0  requires factions { barbarian, hun, } 
                recruit "naval large boats"  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "Zouke wei"  2  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                recruit "Mengchong wei"  2  requires factions { numidia, armenia, carthaginian, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { eastern, } 
                recruit "naval triremes"  0  requires factions { eastern, } 
                recruit "naval quinquiremes"  0  requires factions { eastern, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "naval triremes"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "naval quinquiremes"  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "naval triremes"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "naval quinquiremes"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_scipii, romans_brutii, romans_senate, } 
                recruit "naval triremes"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_scipii, romans_brutii, romans_senate, } 
                recruit "naval quinquiremes"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_scipii, romans_brutii, romans_senate, } 
                trade_fleet 1 requires factions { spain, dacia, britons, carthaginian, } 
                trade_fleet 3 requires factions { numidia, armenia, barbarian, roman, hun, eastern, egyptian, greek, carthaginian, } 
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 10
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  5400 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }

            }

            cost  900

            }
        }

            }

                taxable_income_bonus bonus 30 requires factions { carthaginian, } 
            }

            }

building academic
{
    levels academy scriptorium ludus_magnus 
    {
        academy requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }  and building_present_min_level market market
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                recruit "roman ballista"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, } 
                recruit "greek ballista"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "merc ballistae"  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  2000 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                scriptorium
            }
        }
        scriptorium requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }  and building_present_min_level market forum
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                recruit "roman ballista"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, } 
                recruit "roman scorpion"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, } 
                recruit "roman onager"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, } 
                recruit "roman repeating ballista"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, } 
                recruit "greek ballista"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "greek onager"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "carthaginian onager"  0  requires factions { carthage, } 
                recruit "egyptian onager"  0  requires factions { egypt, } 
                recruit "east onager"  0  requires factions { parthia, } 
                recruit "merc ballistae"  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "merc onagers"  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  4200

            upgrades

            }

            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3

                recruit "roman scorpion"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, } 
                recruit "roman onager"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, } 
                recruit "roman repeating ballista"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, } 
                recruit "roman heavy onager"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, } 
                recruit "greek ballista"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "greek onager"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "greek heavy onager"  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                recruit "carthaginian onager"  0  requires factions { carthage, } 
                recruit "carthaginian heavy onager"  0  requires factions { carthage, } 
                recruit "egyptian onager"  0  requires factions { egypt, }

building despotic_law
{
    levels execution_square secret_police_hq secret_police_network 
    {
        execution_square requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                law_bonus bonus 2
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 20 requires factions { carthaginian, } 
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  2000 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                secret_police_hq
            }
        }
        secret_police_hq requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                law_bonus bonus 3
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 40 requires factions { carthaginian, } 
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  4200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                secret_police_network
            }
        }
        secret_police_network requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                law_bonus bonus 4
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 60 requires factions { carthaginian, } 
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  8400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                law_bonus bonus 4
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  4200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_justice_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_justice_pantheon requires factions { egyptian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 7
                law_bonus bonus 5
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
                population_health_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  8400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building temple_of_law
{
    levels temple_of_law_shrine temple_of_law_temple temple_of_law_large_temple temple_of_law_awesome_temple temple_of_law_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_law_shrine requires factions { scythia, egyptian, romans_scipii, carthaginian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                law_bonus bonus 1
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  500 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_law_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_law_temple requires factions { scythia, egyptian, romans_scipii, carthaginian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 2
recruits_exp_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  1000 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_law_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_law_large_temple requires factions { scythia, egyptian, romans_scipii, carthaginian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                law_bonus bonus 3
recruits_exp_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  2000 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_law_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_law_awesome_temple requires factions { egyptian, romans_scipii, carthaginian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                law_bonus bonus 4
                weapon_simple bonus 1
                weapon_bladed bonus 1
                weapon_missile bonus 1
                armour bonus 1
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 4
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  4200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_law_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_law_pantheon requires factions { egyptian, romans_scipii, carthaginian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                law_bonus bonus 5
                weapon_simple bonus 1
                weapon_bladed bonus 1
                armour bonus 1
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 5
                weapon_missile bonus 4
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  8400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }

{
    levels temple_of_love_shrine temple_of_love_temple temple_of_love_large_temple temple_of_love_awesome_temple temple_of_love_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_love_shrine requires factions { scythia, greek_cities, carthaginian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  500 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_love_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_love_temple requires factions { scythia, greek_cities, carthaginian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
                recruit "merc ballistae"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  1000 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_love_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_love_large_temple requires factions { scythia, greek_cities, carthaginian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 6
                population_growth_bonus bonus 3
                recruit "merc ballistae"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                recruit "merc onagers"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  2000 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_love_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_love_awesome_temple requires factions { greek_cities, carthaginian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 8
                population_growth_bonus bonus 4
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
                recruit "merc ballistae"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                recruit "merc onagers"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  4200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_love_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_love_pantheon requires factions { greek_cities, carthaginian, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 10
                population_growth_bonus bonus 5
                farming_level bonus 2
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
                weapon_missile bonus 3
                recruit "merc ballistae"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                recruit "merc onagers"  0  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  8400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }

building temple_of_naval
{
    levels temple_of_naval_shrine temple_of_naval_temple temple_of_naval_large_temple temple_of_naval_awesome_temple temple_of_naval_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_naval_shrine requires factions { romans_scipii, }  and building_present_min_level port_buildings port
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  500 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_naval_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_naval_temple requires factions { romans_scipii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  1000 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_naval_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_naval_large_temple requires factions { romans_scipii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  2000 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_naval_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_naval_awesome_temple requires factions { romans_scipii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval corvus quinquireme"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_scipii, romans_brutii, romans_senate, } 
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  4200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_naval_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_naval_pantheon requires factions { romans_scipii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval deceres"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_scipii, romans_brutii, romans_senate, } 
                recruit "naval corvus quinquireme"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_scipii, romans_brutii, romans_senate, } 
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                law_bonus bonus 2
                weapon_simple bonus 1
                weapon_bladed bonus 1
                armour bonus 1
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  8400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
